alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 16 at 1:39PM EST until November 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Snow will occur across southwestern Lewis county, especially across the Tug Hill late tonight through Thursday morning. Snow accumulations will range from 8 to 14 inches through Thursday. Expect the bands to then shift to far northern Lewis county Thursday night into Friday night. Expected snow accumulations over far northern Lewis county Thursday night through Friday night will range from 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph with produce patchy blowing snow. * WHERE...Lewis county. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4355 7547 4361 7600 4357 7606 4351 7608 4346 7603 4348 7581 4342 7586 4347 7570 4342 7550 4348 7540 TIME Y22M11D17T0000Z-Y22M11D17T0600Z COORD...4348 7564 4365 7598 4365 7620 4355 7625 4356 7643 4345 7663 4338 7659 4333 7630 4333 7587 4346 7581 TIME Y22M11D17T0600Z-Y22M11D17T1800Z COORD...4352 7559 4358 7573 4363 7600 4352 7620 4351 7629 4344 7627 4336 7590 4346 7581 4348 7581 4345 7555 TIME Y22M11D17T1800Z-Y22M11D18T0600Z COORD...4413 7534 4419 7537 4433 7568 4437 7581 4427 7611 4412 7638 4402 7640 4399 7634 4384 7634 4388 7586 TIME Y22M11D18T1200Z-Y22M11D19T1200Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
